verses.verse: And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H3212>Depart<s%>, and go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H5971>here<s%>, you and the people which you have brought <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, unto the <S%H776>land<s%> which I <S%H7650>swore<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, to <S%H3327>Isaac<s%>, and to <S%H3290>Jacob<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, Unto your <S%H2233>seed<s%> will I give <S%H5414>it<s%>:

And I will <S%H7971>send<s%> an <S%H4397>angel<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and I will drive <S%H1644>out<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%>, the <S%H567>Amorite<s%>, and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%>, and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%>, the <S%H2340>Hivite<s%>, and the <S%H2983>Jebusite<s%>:

Unto a <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2100>flowing<s%> with <S%H2461>milk<s%> and <S%H1706>honey<s%>: for I will not go <S%H5927>up<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you for you are a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>: lest I <S%H3615>consume<s%> you in the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> these <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H1697>news<s%>, they <S%H56>mourned<s%>: and no <S%H376>man<s%> did <S%H7896>put<s%> on him his <S%H5716>jewelry<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, You are a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%>: If I were to come <S%H5927>up<s%> into the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you in <S%H259>a<s%> <S%H7281>moment<s%>, I would <S%H3615>consume<s%> <S%H3381>you<s%>: therefore now put off your <S%H5716>jewelry<s%> from <S%H3045>you<s%>, that I may know what to do unto <S%H6213>you<s%>.
And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5337>stripped<s%> themselves of their <S%H5716>jewelry<s%> by the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> <S%H2722>Horeb<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, and <S%H5186>pitched<s%> it <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, afar <S%H7368>off<s%> from the <S%H4264>camp<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> it the <S%H168>Tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>. And it came to <S%H1245>pass<s%>, that every one which sought the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation<s%>, which was <S%H2351>outside<s%> the <S%H4264>camp<s%>.

And it came to <S%H4872>pass<s%>, when Moses went <S%H3318>out<s%> unto the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, that all the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%>, and <S%H5324>stood<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> at his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>, and <S%H5027>looked<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, until he was <S%H935>gone<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.

And it came to <S%H4872>pass<s%>, as Moses <S%H935>entered<s%> into the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%>, and <S%H5975>stood<s%> at the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>, and the Lord <S%H1696>talked<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses<s%>.

And all the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H6051>cloudy<s%> <S%H5982>pillar<s%> <S%H5975>stand<s%> at the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>: and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> rose <S%H6965>up<s%> and <S%H7812>worshiped<s%>, every <S%H376>man<s%> in his <S%H168>tent<s%> <S%H6607>door<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6440>face<s%> to <S%H6440>face<s%>, as a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H1696>speaks<s%> unto his <S%H7453>friend<s%>. And he turned <S%H7725>again<s%> into the <S%H4264>camp<s%>: but his <S%H8334>servant<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%>, the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun<s%>, a young <S%H5288>man<s%>, <S%H4185>departed<s%> not <S%H8432>out<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%>.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, <S%H7200>See<s%>, you <S%H559>sayest<s%> unto <S%H5927>me<s%>, Bring up this <S%H5971>people<s%>: and you have not let me <S%H3045>know<s%> whom you will <S%H7971>send<s%> with <S%H559>me<s%>. Yet you have said, I <S%H3045>know<s%> you by <S%H8034>name<s%>, and you have also <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>.

Now <S%H4672>therefore<s%>, I pray you, if I have found <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>, <S%H3045>show<s%> me now your <S%H1870>way<s%>, that I may <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H4672>you<s%>, that I may find <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>: and <S%H7200>consider<s%> that this <S%H1471>nation<s%> is your <S%H5971>people<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, My <S%H6440>presence<s%> shall <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H5117>you<s%>, and I will give you rest.
And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6440>him<s%>, If your presence <S%H1980>go<s%> not with <S%H5927>me<s%>, carry us not up here.

For where shall it be <S%H3045>known<s%> <S%H645>here<s%> that I and your <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in your <S%H5869>sight<s%>? is it not in that you <S%H3212>go<s%> with <S%H6395>us<s%>? so shall we be separated, I and your <S%H5971>people<s%>, from all the <S%H5971>people<s%> that are upon the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth<s%>.

And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H4872>Moses<s%>, I will <S%H6213>do<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%> also that you have <S%H1696>spoken<s%>: for you have <S%H4672>found<s%> <S%H2580>grace<s%> in my <S%H5869>sight<s%>, and I <S%H3045>know<s%> you by <S%H8034>name<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I beg <S%H4994>you<s%>, <S%H7200>show<s%> me your <S%H3519>glory<s%>.

And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I will make all my <S%H2898>goodness<s%> <S%H5674>pass<s%> before <S%H7121>you<s%>, and I will proclaim the <S%H8034>name<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> you and will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to whom I will be <S%H2603>gracious<s%>, and will show <S%H7355>mercy<s%> on whom I will show <S%H7355>mercy<s%>.
And he <S%H559>said<s%>, You <S%H3201>can<s%> not <S%H7200>see<s%> my <S%H6440>face<s%>: for there shall no <S%H120>man<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H2425>me<s%>, and live.
And the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H4725>Behold<s%>, there is a place by <S%H5324>me<s%>, and you shall stand upon a <S%H6697>rock<s%>:

And it shall come to <S%H3519>pass<s%>, while my glory passes <S%H5674>by<s%>, that I will <S%H7760>put<s%> you in a <S%H5366>cleft<s%> of the <S%H6697>rock<s%>, and will <S%H5526>cover<s%> you with my <S%H3709>hand<s%> <S%H5704>while<s%> I pass <S%H5674>by<s%>:
And I will <S%H5493>take<s%> away my <S%H3709>hand<s%>, and you shall <S%H7200>see<s%> my back <S%H268>parts<s%>: but my <S%H6440>face<s%> shall not be <S%H7200>seen<s%>.
